data.name: ForceUnlockDesc
data.value: Use this when a note is stuck in 'Editing' mode or the list is not updating even after saving. This often happens if the note is being edited on another PC or if a previous session ended unexpectedly. (Caution: Data loss may occur if the note is actively being edited on another device.)

data.value: â“ Help: What is cloud integration?

data.name: CloudHelpQ1
data.value: Q. What is Image Link creation?

data.name: CloudHelpA1
data.value: It is a feature that uploads captured images to a server and creates a URL for instant sharing.

data.name: CloudHelpA2
data.value: A popular image hosting service. Excellent for image management and stability using your own API key.

data.name: CloudHelpA3
data.value: Connect your Google or Dropbox account. It uses your own storage, offering more space and permanent preservation.

data.name: CloudNotConnectedMsg

data.name: ImageNotVisibleContent
data.value:
If saving or displaying images in your notes is not working correctly due to system environment issues, please refer to the guide below.
ðŸ“Œ Primary Causes 1. Special Characters in Username: If your Windows account name contains special characters (e.g., & or #), the app may fail to recognize profile paths, leading to save failures. 2. Folder Access Permissions: Windows security settings (Firewall/Ransomware Protection) may block file writing in certain folders.
ðŸ’¡ Solution - Change Storage Path: Go to [Note Settings] and change the storage location to a simple, safe path like 'D:\' or 'C:\' that is independent of your user account profile.
If the problem persists, please contact us via the 'Contact Us' link at the bottom of the screen.

data.name: ConfirmRestore
data.value: Do you want to restore the selected content?\nAny current changes will be lost.
